title: Enhancing Knowledge Transfer via Concept Mapping in Chemistry: Feedback Timing and Experience-Integrated Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemistry concepts and practical experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on concept mapping and feedback activities using VR simulations in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, linked to real-world work scenarios for in-service professionals' chemical problem-solving training

learning_goals: Learners can create concept maps visualizing relationships between chemical concepts with at least 80% accuracy.
Improve knowledge transfer ability by at least 20% based on feedback type (immediate/delayed).
Enhance the ability to apply concept mapping experiences to new chemical problems by at least 15%.
Learners can establish self-reflective learning strategies using concept map quality evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
